title: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content:
I can now release my skin![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Why?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] Because I found a CD burning program![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

I just need someone to email it to...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] -------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society

title: Re: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content: You can easily get an account to Geocities (for example) and upload it there.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content: Try grafix5000 at gmail d0t com. (That's my email address and it's checked regularly)

title: Re: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content:
You're about to shed your skin and you want to try and burn something on it?
Well, it's cheaper than using CDs I suppose.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Try grafix5000 at gmail d0t com. (That's my email address and it's checked regularly)[hr][/quote] Okay, I sent you an email to your email address (grafix5000 at gmail d0t com) that contains a zip.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Inside the zip is my Keen skin.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You should receive it soon.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

[quote]Quote:[hr]You can easily get an account to Geocities (for example) and upload it there.[hr][/quote]

I will upload it there, to, just incase grafix5000 doesn't receive the email I sent him. I'm not trying to be rude to him, but I might have to upload it on the site you suggested. I may also have to email it to more than on person. For example, I sent it to XkyRauh-- Oops, I forgot to attatch it! I sent you an other one that has it though. I'm not trying to be rude to anyone, but it must be posted on this forum.-------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society

title: Re: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content:
For a moment after reading the title of this thread, I thought you were a snake or something...

Anyway, I always enjoy new Keen skins, so I'll be downloading when you've got it up.

One other thing - I'm not sure if Grafix would appriciate a direct, clickable mention of his email address in your last post. That's why he wrote it as grafix5000 at gmail d0t com in his post. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] --------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: I'm finally able to release my skin!
content:
Please get rid of my email address - I'm now getting rather a large amount of spam because you included it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] It's bad to put non-obfuscated email addresses on the web, by the way. (HarveySmiths3rdemail at hotmail d0t com would be better than your clickable link)

Anyway, here's the file: [url=http://www.stephenarnott.plus.com/files/harvey.zip]www.stephenarnott.plus.com/files/harvey.zip[/url]

EDIT: And the email link is removed. Yay.[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: hehe
content: Hey, not bad, Harvey!  It's a pretty cute skin, although Keen looks really skinny.  The pogo frames and caught-in-ice frames animated well.  I gotta admit it was pretty weird to see Keen facing the screen the whole time, as opposed to looking where he's going, but this is a good effort for your first try ever.  Are you going to keep remaking enemies and release a full mod?  Or is this all you planned on?

title: Re: hehe
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Are you going to keep remaking enemies and release a full mod? Or is this all you planned on?[hr][/quote] I will make a mod with my skin, but not from the skin. I added my skin to a copy of the file Keen1 is in, so I can make a mod from that.

EDIT: I'm just about finished! All I need to do is finish the tiles and the one moment image, and then I'm done!

EDIT: Oh, darn, I forgot about levels, end picture and patches! I'm bad at making levels, someone please email me good levels at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url]!-------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]
